oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Baptist Memorial Hospital Exterior
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Baptist Memorial Hospital exterior color image.

“Baptist Memorial Hospital -- In the heart of the Memphis Medical Center. -- Opened 1912. Madison East addition built in 1956 -- at a cost of 8 ½ million dollars, increasing its -- bed capacity to 920. [typed/pre-printed] -- M sole 1980 [Handwritten]”
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Baptist Memorial Hospital; hospitals; medicine;
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Bluff City News Co., Memphis, Tenn.
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Plastichrome by “Colourpicture” Publication, Cambridge, Mass., U.S.A.; Collection processed by Angela Price
